Describe MSI K8N Neo V here.

== Ubuntu i386 5.10 Server ==

+Add X windows

* No 3D accelleration

* 2D graphics slow

* PATA disks extremely slow

* Floppy untested

* USB OK

* Sound output not tested

* Sound input not tested

* SATA disk OK - a bit on the slow side.

* LAN 10/100 Base T intermittent errors on 100 Base T ( might be hardware failure )

* PATA disk 

* IEEE 1284 Parallell Port untested

* RS-232 Serial Port untested

* Keyboard OK

* Mouse OK

* Cool'n'Quiet intermittent errors (Bios 7.32 V.70) powernow-k8: Hardware error - pending bit very stuck - no further pstate changes possible

Note that the BIOS is difficult to update since MSI only gives a DOS upgrade diskette.
